---
title: "yeardecimal"
---


```
yeardecimal(date)
```

Convert a Date or DateTime or a string representation of them to decimal years, or vice-versa. That is, convert from decimal year to DateTime.

### Example

```
yeardecimal(now())
```


## Methods

```julia
# 4 methods for generic function "yeardecimal" from GMT:
 [1] yeardecimal(years::Real)
 [2] yeardecimal(dtm::Union{DateTime, Vector{DateTime}})
 [3] yeardecimal(dtm::Union{Date, Vector{Date}})
 [4] yeardecimal(dtm::Union{String, Vector{String}})
```
